trends: There have been no other sightings in Ballarat
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis sighting was done not by me but a friend of mine. He is not computer savvy and gave permission to me to report to anyone I found on the net that might help to explain it. While camping in the desert he woke up and needed to relive himself. Outside he was admiring the stars when a very bright star moved. It caught his eye. He call for his wife and asked her to bring her new Droid phone. They both watched this star move and stop several times. They took a picture of it with their Droid Phone. They said they then looked at the picture on the phone and enlarged it and saw what I am sending to you now. When they looked back up the light was gone.
